imdb.plot outline: Follow John on his misadventures through his daily conspiracy-filled life. Join him as he goes solving conspiracy theories, signing autographs, buying Bill Gates, you name it. John will most likely do it- in one day. Joined by his other "Johns" of many personalities, John is always one step ahead of the secrets.
imdb.title: The Lost Files of John
akas: The Lost Files of John (United States)
plot: A conspiracy-suspicious high school student investigates everything and everyone in this reality-comedy web series.::Clovis Kyle Lowell

Follow John on his misadventures through his daily conspiracy-filled life. Join him as he goes solving conspiracy theories, signing autographs, buying Bill Gates, you name it. John will most likely do it- in one day. Joined by his other "Johns" of many personalities, John is always one step ahead of the secrets.::Clovis Kyle Lowell
